Waits for the specified period of time until the service with the given name becomes available.

Parameters:
name - the service name.
timeout - the timeout.

getAdmin

public org.openspaces.admin.Admin getAdmin()
Returns the Admin Object the underlies the Service Context. Note: this is intended as a debugging aid, and should not be used by most application. Only power users, familiar with the details of the Admin API, should use it.

Returns:
